name: Kodamachi
description:
Kodamachi is a 2D arcade platformer where you can’t jump so carelessly. With a platform changing mechanic that lets your discover new paths, quirky NPCs, and a retro arcade aesthetic, play through a delightful short story as you swiftly drift atop the brilliantly lit rooftops of a Japanese city.

Yakuyaku met his end at the hands of one of his closest friends.

He restlessly wandered the spirit realm on a quest to unravel the truth about his death but as time past, he grew weary... until he met you forty years after his death one evening. As a spirit medium, only you have the power to bring the mystery of Yakuyaku's death to light! Using your ability to shift between the spirit realm and physical realm, you must tread carefully as you explore the city searching for Yakuyaku's friends and clues leading to his death.


Difficulty:
Hard

Lucille Liu
